            <p>Video-on-demand digital media</p>
        </a>
        <ul class="card-content-metadata">
            <li>12/16/2019</li>
            <li>2 min read</li>
        </ul>
        <p class="card-content-description">A basic video-on-demand solution that gives you the capability to stream recorded video content such as movies, news clips, sports segments, training videos, and customer support tutorials to any video-capable endpoint device, mobile application, or desktop browser. Video files are uploaded to Azure Blob storage, encoded to a multi-bitrate standard format, and then distributed via all major adaptive bit-rate streaming protocols (HLS, MPEG-DASH, Smooth) to the Azure Media Player client.</p>
